$$id.description: The unique id of the component, mainly used to locate json nodes in the page designer

$ref.description: Used together with definitions, an infinite loop renderer can be implemented.

id.description: The unique id of the component, mainly used for log collection

staticPlaceholder.description: Static display of empty value placeholder

staticClassName.description: Static display form item class name

staticLabelClassName.description: Static display of form item Label class name

staticInputClassName.description: Static display of form item Value class name

behavior.description: Component behavior and usage, such as create, update, remove

displayName.description: Component name, usually the business name for easy location

mock.description: Editor fake data for easy display

editorSetting.description: Editor configuration, can be ignored at runtime

useMobileUI.description: Can be used to turn off mobile style at the component level

actionFinishLabel.description: Text description of the completion button

actionNextSaveLabel.description: Next and save the text description of the button

actionPrevLabel.description: Text description of the previous button

api.description: API used by Wizard to save data. [Details](https://baidu.github.io/amis/docs/api#wizard)

bulkSubmit.description: Whether to merge and then submit

initApi.description: API used by Wizard to get initial data.

readOnly.description: Whether it is in read-only mode.

redirect.description: After saving, you can specify a redirect address, supports relative paths and absolute paths within groups, and can use variables through

target.description: By default, the form submission itself will save the data by sending the api, but you can also set the name value of another form, or the name value of another `CRUD` model. If the target is a `Form`, the target `Form` will retrigger `initApi` and `schemaApi`, and the api can get the current form data. If the target is a `CRUD` model, the target model retriggers the search with the current Form data as the parameter.

affixFooter.description: Whether to pin the bottom button to the bottom.

footerClassName.description: css class for bottom action bar

wrapWithPanel.description: Whether to wrap it with panel
